described in the book. But in some cases his own documents contradict his recall of events. For example, in the book, Donald Rumsfeld describes the Andijan uprising as fomented by "rebels" from an Islamist extremist group accused of seeking an Islamic state, a caliphate, in eastern Uzbekistan. In the footnotes, Donald Rumsfeld cites an assessment by the Defense Intelligence Agency, the Pentagon's intelligence-gathering operation, about the Andijan events.
